nodes.text: Morlimur Snugg was a male Snivvian who worked for the InterGalactic Banking Clan during the Clone Wars as a superintendent. He owned the ALC-9. In 20 BBY, he guided around Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi and Adi Gallia after the Nightbrothers Darth Maul and Savage Opress raided the Cybloc Transfer Station.
Morlimur Snugg was voiced by Jim Cummings, who also portrays Hondo Ohnaka in the series.
